entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 29 April 2016
